mapper.insert: insert into replication_applier_status_by_worker (CHANNEL_NAME, WORKER_ID, THREAD_ID, SERVICE_STATE, LAST_SEEN_TRANSACTION, LAST_ERROR_NUMBER, LAST_ERROR_MESSAGE, LAST_ERROR_TIMESTAMP) values (#{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{workerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{threadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastSeenTransaction,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastErrorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastErrorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastErrorTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select CHANNEL_NAME, WORKER_ID, THREAD_ID, SERVICE_STATE, LAST_SEEN_TRANSACTION, LAST_ERROR_NUMBER, LAST_ERROR_MESSAGE, LAST_ERROR_TIMESTAMP from replication_applier_status_by_worker
